alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Fluvanna; Goochland; Louisa; Powhatan (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 26 at 2:46PM EDT until April 26 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Louisa County in central Virginia... Northeastern Cumberland County in central Virginia... Northwestern Goochland County in central Virginia... Northwestern Powhatan County in central Virginia... Southern Fluvanna County in central Virginia... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 245 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Canton, or near Fork Union, moving east to northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Fork Union around 300 PM EDT. Lakeside Village around 305 PM EDT. Columbia and Duncan around 310 PM EDT. Fife around 320 PM EDT. Hadensville around 330 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Dixie, Sandy Hook, Stage Junction, Three Square, Shores, Irwin, Central Plains, Bremo Bluff, Tamworth and Caledonia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
